programme.title: American Star
programme.desc: Out to kill a man he has never met, Wilson, a seasoned assassin completing his final assignment in Fuerteventura, is drawn to a ghostly shipwreck. Thriller, starring Ian McShane, Nora Arnezeder and Fanny Ardant Gonzalo López-Gallego - Director Ian McShane - Wilson Nora Arnezeder - Gloria Adam Nagaitis - Ryan Andrés Gertrúdix - Cowboy Oscar Coleman - Max Sabela Arán - Linda Thomas Kretschmann - Thomas Fanny Ardant - Anne.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-April 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: A Sacrifice
programme.desc: US social psychologist Ben Monroe investigates a local cult connected to an unnerving event, while his daughter becomes mixed up with an enigmatic local boy. Co-writer/director Jordan Scott's drama, starring Eric Bana, Sylvia Hoeks and Sadie Sink (Stranger Things) Jordan Scott (1) - Director Eric Bana - Ben Monroe Sadie Sink - Mazzy Monroe Sylvia Hoeks - Nina Jonas Dassler - Martin Sophie Rois - Hilma Stephan Kampwirth - Max Aumann Lara Feith - Lotte.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: While visiting an island for her husband's work, a woman meets a stranger who takes over her life. Thriller, starring Ashley Greene, Brooke Lyons and Tom Felton. Directed by Joel David Moore, better known as one of the stars of the Avatar films Joel David Moore - Director Amanda Crew - Eve Carver Tom Felton - Peter Carver Ashley Greene - Renata Brooke Lyons - Chelsea Ranza Rick Fox - Salvador Ranza.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. The device gives its wearer the ability to travel 57 seconds into the past, so Franklin decides to use it to take revenge against the pharmaceutical company responsible for his sister's death. Thriller, starring Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman Rusty Cundieff - Director Josh Hutcherson - Franklin Fox Morgan Freeman - Anton Burrell Greg Germann - Sig Thorenson Lovie Simone - Jala Bevin Bru - Renee Renzler Sammi Rotibi - Calvert.

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: Biblical comedy starring LaKeith Stanfield. In AD 33 Jerusalem, debt-ridden criminal Clarence, the ne'er-do-well atheist brother of apostle Thomas, decides to make some much-needed cash by posing as a new messiah. But learning the same "tricks" as Jesus Christ proves tougher than initially assumed Jeymes Samuel - Director LaKeith Stanfield - Clarence / Thomas Omar Sy - Barabbas Anna Diop - Varinia R J Cyler - Elijah David Oyelowo - John the Baptist Micheal Ward - Judas Iscariot Alfre Woodard - Virgin Mary Teyana Taylor - Mary Magdalene Caleb McLaughlin - Dirty Zeke Marianne Jean-Baptiste - Amina James McAvoy - Pontius Pilate Benedict Cumberbatch - Benjamin.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Comedy starring Bradley Cooper, Zach Galifianakis and Ed Helms. Three friends wake up in a wrecked Vegas hotel room following a stag night for their friend Doug. As the day progresses the wild events of the night before fall into place - all they have to do now is find the groom Todd Phillips - Director Bradley Cooper - Phil Wenneck Heather Graham - Jade Justin Bartha - Doug Billings Zach Galifianakis - Alan Garner Ed Helms - Stu Price Jeffrey Tambor - Sid Sasha Barrese - Tracy Garner Ken Jeong - Mr Chow Mike Tyson - Mike Tyson.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Comedy starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms and Zach Galifianakis. Two years after their disastrous trip to Las Vegas, the Wolf Pack head to Thailand for a stag party - but, as always, things don't go exactly to plan Todd Phillips - Director Bradley Cooper - Phil Wenneck Ed Helms - Stu Price Zach Galifianakis - Alan Garner Justin Bartha - Doug Billings Ken Jeong - Mr Chow Paul Giamatti - Kingsley Jamie Chung - Lauren Mason Lee - Teddy Mike Tyson - Mike Tyson Jeffrey Tambor - Sid Garner.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: Comedy starring Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms and Zach Galifianakis. History repeats itself for the Wolfpack when one of their group is kidnapped and they have to renew old acquaintances back in Las Vegas to secure his release Todd Phillips - Director Bradley Cooper - Phil Ed Helms - Stu Zach Galifianakis - Alan Ken Jeong - Mr Chow Heather Graham - Jade Justin Bartha - Doug John Goodman - Marshall Jeffrey Tambor - Sid Melissa McCarthy - Cassie Jamie Chung - Lauren.

programme.title: Cats & Dogs
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Action, Fantasy, Children's ║ 2001 ║ PG
programme.desc: Part-animated fantasy comedy starring Jeff Goldblum and Elizabeth Perkins. Beagle puppy Lou is inadvertently enlisted to fight in the ongoing war against the feline population. Can he save the day against megalomaniac cat Mr Tinkles Lawrence Guterman - Director Jeff Goldblum - Professor Brody Elizabeth Perkins - Mrs Brody Miriam Margolyes - Sophie Alexander Pollock - Scott Brody Tobey Maguire - Lou Alec Baldwin - Butch Sean Hayes - Mr Tinkles Susan Sarandon - Ivy Joe Pantoliano - Peek Michael Clarke Duncan - Sam Jon Lovitz - Calico Charlton Heston - The Mastiff Danny Mann - Ninja Billy West - Ninja.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Alexander Skarsgård, Samuel L Jackson and Margot Robbie. programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2002 ║ PG
programme.desc: Action adventure fantasy starring The Rock. In ancient times, powerful warrior Memnon presides over the desert with the aid of sorceress Cassandra. In an attempt to bring down this mighty duo, the assassin Mathayus is hired to kill Cassandra and thereafter become king of the last free tribes.n Chuck Russell - Director Dwayne Johnson - Mathayus, the Scorpion King Michael Clarke Duncan - Balthazar Steven Brand - Memnon Kelly Hu - Cassandra Bernard Hill - Philos Grant Heslov - Arpid Peter Facinelli - Prince Takmet Ralf Moeller - Thorak Sherri Howard - Queen Isis Roger Rees - King Pheron.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person Kobi Libii - Director Justice Smith - Aren David Alan Grier - Roger An-Li Bogan - Lizzie Drew Tarver - Jason Munt Aisha Hinds - Gabbard.

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: The first part of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy based on the book by JRR Tolkien, starring Martin Freeman and Ian McKellen. Encouraged by the wizard Gandalf, Bilbo Baggins leaves the comfort of his home in the Shire to join a band of dwarves in their quest to reclaim the Kingdom of Erebor from the dragon Smaug. It is a journey that will see the plucky hobbit encounter goblins, orcs and a very strange creature called Gollum Peter Jackson - Director Ian McKellen - Gandalf the Grey Martin Freeman - Bilbo Baggins Richard Armitage - Thorin Oakenshield James Nesbitt - Bofur Ken Stott - Balin Sylvester McCoy - Radagast Barry Humphries - Great Goblin Cate Blanchett - Galadriel Ian Holm - Old Bilbo Christopher Lee - Saruman Hugo Weaving - Lord Elrond Elijah Wood - Frodo Andy Serkis - Gollum Aidan Turner - Kili Lee Pace - Thranduil Benedict Cumberbatch - Necromancer Graham McTavish - Dwalin Dean O'Gorman - Fili Stephen Hunter (3) - Bombur Adam Brown - Ori.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. programme.title: A Tiger's Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creature's mother. programme.title: Fight Night Int
programme.desc: Natasha Jonas and Lauren Price headline a historic all-women's card at the iconic Royal Albert Hall, as the British pair collide in a world welterweight division unification fight. (07.03).

programme.title: Fight Night Int
programme.desc: At the home of Barnsley FC, Oakwell Stadium sees British & Commonwealth super-middleweight champion Zak Chelli enter the lion's den to face undefeated hometown hero Callum Simpson. (03.08).

programme.title: EFL 14/15: Swindon v Sheff Utd
programme.desc: Relive a classic match from the English Football League. Here, Swindon Town host Sheffield United at the County Ground in a 10-goal thriller in the play-offs back in May 2015.

programme.title: EFL 14/15: Norwich v Ipswich
programme.desc: Relive some classic action from the English Football League. Here, East Anglian rivals Norwich City and Ipswich Town meet at Carrow Road in the Sky Bet play-offs in May 2015.

programme.title: EFL 14/15: Derby County v Leeds
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic action from the EFL. Here, Derby County take on Leeds United at Pride Park in August 2015 in a game that saw a thrilling late winner.

programme.title: EFL 15/16: Hull City v Reading
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic action from the EFL. Here, Hull City take on Reading at the KC Stadium in December 2015 in a thrilling clash that saw a late winner.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Spurs/Chelsea 08
programme.desc: Relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Spurs and Chelsea go head-to-head at White Hart Lane in an end-to-end encounter that produced eight goals.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man Utd/Man City
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic action from the Premier League. Here, a memorable Manchester derby at Old Trafford back in the 2011-12 season that saw a six-goal Man City run rampant.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man U/Arsenal 01
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic action from the Premier League. Here, Manchester United versus Arsenal back in the 2000-01 season in a one-sided game that saw seven goals.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games: L'pool/Newc 96
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, rewind to the seven-goal thriller between Liverpool and Newcastle United at Anfield back in the 1995-96 season.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Langer Full Swing
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game from the tee to the green. Here, former Masters winner Bernhard Langer gives his top tips on the full swing.

programme.title: Golf Academy: Langer Driver
programme.desc: Professional golfers give advice on how to improve your game from the tee to the green. Here, former Masters winner Bernhard Langer on how to best use the driver.

programme.title: EFL 15/16: QPR v Middlesbrough
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic action from the English Football League. Here, QPR host Middlesbrough in a five-goal thriller at Loftus Road in the 2015-16 season.

programme.title: EFL 15/16: B'ham v Middlesbrough
programme.desc: Relive some classic action from the English Football League. Here, Birmingham City take on Middlesbrough at St Andrew's in a four-goal thriller in the 2015-16 season.

programme.title: EFL 15/16:Middlesbrough v Brighton
programme.desc: A look back at some classic matches from the English Football League. Here, Middlesbrough take on Brighton and Hove Albion in a tense Championship promotion decider in May 2016.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Aston Villa v N. Forest
programme.desc: A look back at some classic matches from the English Football League. Here, Aston Villa play Nottingham Forest in a thrilling draw in September 2016 in the Sky Bet Championship.

programme.desc: Delhi Capitals and Sunrisers Hyderabad battle in the IPL. (30.03).

programme.title: IPL: RR v CSK Highlights
programme.desc: Rajasthan Royals battle Chennai Super Kings in the IPL. (30.03).

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the Galleri Classic, a PGA Tour Champions event at Mission Hills Country Club in California. Two-time US Open winner Retief Goosen of South Africa won this event last year.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 Hero Indian Open, taking place at the DLF Golf and Country Club. Japan's Keita Nakajima claimed his first DP World Tour win at this event last year.

programme.title: Golf's Greatest Holes: The Open
programme.desc: Paul and Chris head to the home of the 148th and 153rd Open Championships, Royal Portrush, and are joined by former Open winner Darren Clarke and actor James Nesbitt. (1 of 6).
